subsection_content:
Although it is only a skin problem and poses little danger to health, back acne will have a significant impact on daily activities.
Does it affect daily activities?
Compared to facial acne, back acne also has a significant impact on daily activities. Not only does it cause unsightliness such as leaving red bumps, dark spots, and acne scars, but back acne can cause itching, discomfort, pain, etc. when lying down or rubbing against clothes/furniture.
At a more serious level, acne also has the risk of causing skin infections, leading to longer treatment times and causing many inconveniences in daily life.
Acne on the back causes itching and pain, significantly affecting daily life
